Detailed Description

An animation listener receives notifications from an animation.

Notifications indicate animation related events, such as the end or the repetition of the animation.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void gaia::core::AnimationListener::onAnimationEnd ( Animation *  a) [protected, virtual]

Notifies the end of the animation.

This callback is not invoked for animations with repeat count set to INFINITE.

Parameters:
aThe animation which reached its end.

Notifies the repetition of the animation.

Parameters:
aThe animation which was repeated.
